trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> object on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control is owner-drawn or system-drawn.
Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
The Style property determines the way in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> will be displayed.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects can display simple text or be owner-drawn.

Owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects support displaying images or a different font from the rest of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, while system-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are used to display only text (or text and an icon if an icon is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).

To perform the owner-draw operations on an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> is drawn by the owner.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> displays text in the standard font.
